title: Secret Weapon!
detail_text: <:th_ch0001/>Ahhhh, I can’t find our secret weapon!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Secret weapon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yes! I was preparing a secret weapon to surprise everyone who’s coming...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>You were preparing something like that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You should have discussed it with us. Keeping it to yourself is kind of cold.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe... I wanted to surprise you guys too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0006/>Losing it before you use it... We can’t even help search for it now.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ugh, I’m sorry!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>When was the last time you saw this secret weapon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>If we retrace your steps from your memory, we’ll surely find it!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Like a detective, nya~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s see... I think...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Honokaaaaa!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>What on earth have you forgotten now!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Ah, Kotori-chan, Umi-chan. You’re late.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>What have I forgotten?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Umm... Uhh... That! It’s that, Honoka-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>..........Ah!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0002/>Is it something that all the second years were preparing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eh!? Umm...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0009/>The secret weapon.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Why that!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Ehehe... Sorry! I let it slip! But I’m glad we found it~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>“Glad” is not the right word hereeeee!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
